version_description:
- FIXED: the app is hanging up on start on iOS 5 and 6.
- App size reduced from 32 MB to 25 MB.
- Winter holidays surprises are ready.

- The text is sharp and beautiful.
Text used to look thick and blurred, especially on low resolution displays.
- YoWindow is ready for Winter holidays.
- Product quality improved.

Town: New Year Tree!

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year, friends!
See you in 2016.

- Valentine day surprises in Town.
- Product quality improved.

- Cats in Town. Tap a cat.
- Town: April 1 surprise.

- HOT FIX: startup crash on low resolution devices.

Town
- Dogs.
- New cars.
- Pizza, Ice Cream and Hot Dog lorries. Tap them.
- People spend time in the cafe.
- Men wear appropriate clothes for any season.

- iPhone 6+ support.
- New splash screen design.
HOTFIX: App crashes on Valentine Day in Americana and Town.

Big update!
- Over 700 photographs of cities around the world.
The photos are magical - they can reflect any weather condition.
- New handy location search.
- Accurate weather for your district, if you live in a city.
- Smooth weather transitions.
- Quality. The app is more reliable and fast.
